text: Abasese yakhana amadera adesa asala ebam unana uthale uthala [1]; amara balalama, ete uthiye nina pratyeka srenira yugalera duti [2], yadera birud'dhe purba-sid'dhanta hayeche tara chara apanara paribara-parijanake ebam yara imana eneche taderake. Ara tara sathe imana enechila kebala alpa kayekajana
